title: What Are The OCE IP address
body: I have written a code for Rainmeter Plugin to do a ping test but I need an IP to bounce off, so if anyone can tell me either the ip of the servers or something else i can use i would be very grateful

replies.body:
You can always try just pinging the landing page. It's not the game server, but it'll give you a pretty good idea of what your ping is like connecting to their servers at the time.

190.93.246.186 URL: oce.leagueoflegends.com

l3cdn.riotgames.com is the support/download address (each DNS reads the IP differently, so you might want to ping this one in cmd to get what your one says. If you're out of luck, try 14.200.100.27)

You could also probably search some wiki for it too. I'm sure someone would have written down the IP address.

Best of luck.
